SELECT pm.id proModelId, pm.p_name, pm.year, pm.stage, pm.pro_type, pm.type, pm.pro_category, (CASE WHEN (pm.pro_type = '1,') THEN pm.final_status WHEN (pm.pro_type = '7,') THEN pm.level ELSE '' END) AS "level", pm.short_name, pm.introduction, pm.impdata,
t.id teamId, o6.name "office_name",

FROM pro_model pm LEFT JOIN pro_model_md_gc a ON pm.id = a.model_id AND pm.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN act_yw yw ON yw.id = pm.actyw_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = pm.declare_id LEFT JOIN sys_office o6 ON o6.id = u.office_id
LEFT JOIN team t ON t.id = pm.team_id /** 团队负责人 **/
